element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm works as the regular Dissolve algorithm (see its help file for more information), but uses more than one field to define classes.
In the regular dissolve algorithm, all features with the same value for a given field are dissolved. In this algorithm, features must have the same value not for just a single field, but for a set of them defined by the user.
Apart from that, the behaviour of the algorithm is identical to the Dissolve algorithm

element.name: GROUPING_FIELD
element.text: The names of the fields to define each class, separated by commas. Names are case-sensitive.

element.name: GROUPING_FUNCTIONS
element.text: The values to add to the resulting dissolved polygons.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with dissolved features.
